name: Hooked! (Jollo)
description:
In Hooked! the player needs to use their grappling hook to escape a wall of death while earning points by smashing through floating cubes. 

With their powerful grappling hook the player can create physical connections with all the cubes in the level to fling themselves forward. Smashing through the cubes will destroy them, earning the player points in the process. 

Chaining destructions together will increase your combo and earn you even higher scores! 

Some special cubes will help you escape certain death by giving you some momentum on impact, so use them to your advantage.

 Try it out and battle your friends to see who can get the greatest highscore! 

The game was created during the GMTK Game Jam 2021 by a team of two people. 

Controls:
Hold Left Click to aim 

Let go to shoot 

Right Click to cancel Aiming 

Left click to detach hook from target.
